contentrichtext.text: :''This article concerns the Parish. For other uses of the name Lazarus, see [[Lazarus (disambiguation)]].'' {{Chinese |title=St. Lazarus Parish |pic=Freguesia de Sao Lazaro.PNG |picsize=200px |showflag=jp |s=望德堂区 |t=望德堂區 |p=Wàngdé Tángqū |myr=Wàngdé Tángchyū |j=Mong<sup>6</sup> Dak<sup>1</sup> Tong<sup>4</sup> Koe<sup>1</sup> |y=Mohngdák Tòhngkeu |ci={{IPA-yue|mɔ̀ːŋtɐ́k tʰɔ̏ːŋkʰœ́ː|}} |mi={{IPAc-cmn|wang|4|d|e|2|-|t|ang|2|qü|1}} |por=Freguesia de São Lázaro }} '''St. Lazarus Parish''' ([[Portuguese language|Port.]] ''Freguesia de São Lázaro'') is an east-central region of [[Macau Peninsula]]. It is the smallest sub-district. It is surrounded by [[Our Lady of Fatima Parish, Macau|Our Lady Fatima Parish]], [[St. Anthony Parish]], and [[Cathedral Parish]]. One-third of its region is covered by [[Guia Hill]] (Portuguese: Colina da Guia, Chinese: 松山 or 東望洋山). The south is a commercial district, central common residential district, north and east are high-rise buildings. Only 3% of factories in Macau are here. * [[Area]]: 0.64 km² (9% of the peninsula) * [[Population]]: 32,600 * [[Population density]]: 52,370 persons per km² (second in Macau, after [[St. Anthony Parish]]) ==See also== *[[Fortaleza da Guia]] (Guia Fortress) *[[Parque Municipal da Colina da Guia]] (Guia municipal park) *[[Teleférico da Guia]] (Guia cable car) *[[Jardim da Flora]] (二龍喉花園) *[[Guia Tunnel]] *[[Estrada de Cacilhas]] *[[Avenida do Conselheiro Ferreira de Almeida]] (肥利喇亞美打大馬路, also known as 荷蘭園大馬路) ==External links== *[http://www.dscc.gov.mo/port/detail/frequesi.htm Freguesias da RAEM] *[http://hk.travel.yahoo.com/040723/82/15fc7.html Ferreira de Almeida] {{Macau Freguesias}} {{coord missing|Macau}} [[Category:Freguesias of Macau]] [[Category:Macau Peninsula]] {{Macau-geo-stub}}
